alert.note: Alert for Coastal Indian River; Coastal St. Lucie; Inland Indian River; Inland Martin; Inland Southern Brevard; Inland St. Lucie; Mainland Southern Brevard; Okeechobee; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 2:26PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of St. Lucie, Okeechobee, Indian River, northwestern Martin and southeastern Brevard Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 225 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles east of Sebastian Inlet State Park to Vero Beach South to Buckhead Ridge. Movement was east at 25 mph. Additional showers and storms pushing offshore will be capable of strong wind gusts. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fort Pierce, Sebastian, Vero Beach, Treasure Island and Okeechobee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
